short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add websites that you  frequenty use and open all of them at one go.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to add websites that you need frequently and open all of them at a ingle click of a button when you open your browser after a good night's sleep.

You can even categorise you temporary bookmarks and open websites belonging to a particular category.
